me.text: Born on 7.15.1970 next door to Vernon Valley / Great Gorge ski resort, to a Ski-Instructor, Systems-Analyst father. Currently working at Trainual.com.

milestones.title: Self Taught
milestones.text: BASIC on TRS-80 & CP/M machines (NorthStar), Fortran & TurboPascal on MS-DOS PCs, on thru modern languages and F/OSS.

milestones.title: Bronze Medal: New Jersey Institue of Technology (NJIT) Computer Olympics
Silver Medal: Stockton State College Science Fair
milestones.text: Turbo Pascal: Newer Version of my Atomic Mass Converter

jobs.name: Trainual.com
tasks: Sr. Dev: Wrote a number of new features from the main application.
Data Science Engineer: Rolled out dbt.
Data Science Engineer: Built all of the analytics infrastructure.

jobs.name: ShopRunner.com
tasks: Added features to the main application and Kotlin microservices.
Wrote AWS Lambda: Python on Flask.

jobs.name: RevZilla
tasks: $100,000,000 in revenue the year I was there.

jobs.name: TelVue
jobs.role: Sr Engineer, Web Devlopment Mgr, Director of Software Engineering
tasks: Added lots of features to their Suite of Rails-based products.
Recruiting: Assembled and trained the Dev Team.
Created TelVue Connect, their flagship SAAS product - TelVue's first modern stack.

jobs.name: NetReach
jobs.role: Web Design Mgr, Project Mgr, Sr Engineer
tasks: Consulting, Coding, Management
Hired 5-person Design Dept
Managed, engineered, or designed ~30 projects, including the Philadelphia Eagles

jobs.name: Network Engineering & Office Solutions (NEOS) corp (dba Atlantic Image).
tasks: Built a customer base of 70 clients, mostly oceanfront hotels and restaurants.
Built the first website Cape May County had ever seen.

jobs.name: Aqua Beach Resort: Most-popular hotel in Wildwood.
jobs.role: Director Front-Desk Operations, Controller, Sys Admin, Wwb Designer
tasks: Promoted to Night Auditor in 1 mo. Promoted to Front Desk Mgr 1 mo later.
Assembled and trained team of 10 Desk Clerks and 2 Night Auditors annually. My direct reports.
All the bookkeeping.
Systems Administrator: Rolled out their first network (Win NT), website, etc.
Automation:. Replaced legacy manual processes with technology. Trrained dept in its ues.
Fixed a number process and service problems, cutting costs and raising guest sat.

sections.title: Libraries and Frameworks
skills: Fresh: This site is TypeScript on Deno on Fresh

skills: Serverless: AWS Lambdas & GCP Cloud Functions
